#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long


int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t;
	cin >> (t);
	while(t--) {
		ll n,c;
		cin >> n >> c;

		ll tot = (ll)(n)*(ll)(n+1);
		tot/=2;

		if(c < tot) {
			printf("No\n");
			continue;
		}

		c-=tot;
		ll by = tot-n;

		if(c%n==0 || (c>=by && (c-by)%n==0)) puts("Yes");
		else puts("No");
	}
	return 0;
}
